casebody.data:
No. 08-1529. Esther Hui, et al., Petitioners v. Yanira Castaneda, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Francisco Castaneda, et al. 559 U.S. 932, 130 S. Ct. 1499,

176 L. Ed. 2d 105,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 1034. February 19, 2010.

Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
